JumpRegisterIfLessThanOrEqual.docstring: jump to the address specified in register P if the comparison result in register C corresponds to "less than" or "equal"

JumpAddressIfEqual.docstring: jump to the specified address if the comparison result in register C corresponds to "equality"

JumpAddressIfDivideByZero.docstring: jump to the specified address if the divide by zero flag is set

JumpAddressIfCarry.docstring: jump to the specified address if the carry flag is set

MovePointerSource.docstring: move the contents of register S into memory at address specified by register P

SubtractWithCarryTargetLhsRhs.docstring: subtract (with carry) the values in registers LL and RR, store the result in TT, set zero and carry flags appropriately

CompareTargetLhsRhs.docstring: compare the values in registers LL and RR, store the result (Word::MAX, 0, 1) in TT, set zero flag appropriately

JumpRegisterIfNotCarry.docstring: jump to the address specified in register P if the carry flag is not set

MoveAddressRegister.docstring: move the contents of register R into memory at address A

MultiplyHighLowLhsRhs.docstring: multiply the values in registers LL and RR, store the low part of the result in TT, the high part in HH, set zero and carry flags appropriately

OrTargetLhsRhs.docstring: or the values in registers LL and RR, store the result in TT, set zero flag appropriately

LeftShiftTargetLhsRhs.docstring: left shift the value in register LL by RR bits, store the result in TT, set zero and carry flags appropriately

MoveTargetSource.docstring: move the contents of register S into register T

PollTime.docstring: store the number of milliseconds since the UNIX epoch into registers high and low

PushRegister.docstring: push the value of register RR onto the stack
